archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Administer Registration and Access
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process manages the registration and access rights for various users, including third-party systems, of the workforce management solution.

properties.value: â€¢{T}Defining user access rights, permissions, and rules depending on operations or actions â€¢{T}Establishing rules and permissions for third-party system integrations and data exchange â€¢{T}Tracking and monitoring the use of, and access to, the workforce management system(s) and associated costs of the Workforce Management processes â€¢{T}Establishing and managing information transfer between the enterprise workforce management system(s) and those of external third parties â€¢{T}Identifying any technically driven shortcomings of the workforce management system(s), and providing input to Resource Development & Management processes to rectify these issues
